name: Syncron
tag_list: supply-chain-management-software, supply-chain-software, inventory-management, order-management-software, price-management-software, master-data-management, retail-inventory-management, dealer-inventory-management, inventory-optimization, demand-planning,
overview:
Syncron is a global supply chain management software company offering customizes ERP-independent software solutions and services for manufacturing and distribution companies. The company offers Global Inventory Management, Global Order Management, Global Price Management and Master Data Management specialize in service parts management for dealerships, global visibility within the supply chain and fast ROI for their customers.

For small and medium-sized enterprises, Syncron offers software-as-a-service Cloud Inventory Management with quick and easy set up and at very low financial risk. Syncron managed hosting services at Syncron Data Center.

The company supports businesses within the industries of mining and construction, automotive, industrial equipment, aerospace and defense, transportation, consumer and industrial product. Some of their customers are Volvo Construction Equipment, Mazda, JCB, Komatsu, Atlas Copco, Alfa Laval, Konecranes, Eaton Aerospace, Deutsche Bahn, Electrolux and British Gas.

Founded in 1990 with global HQ in Stockholm, Sweden, Syncron primarily offers its products and services within Europe, North America, Asia and the Middle East and have offices around the words to support its customers.

Specialties: Supply Chain Management Software, Inventory Management, Price Management, Order Management, Retail Inventory Management, Dealer Inventory Management, Service Parts Management, Spare Parts Management, Demand Planning & Forecasting, Inventory Optimization, Replenishment and Collaborative Planning, Strategic Inventory Modeling, Reporting & KPIâ€™s, Price & Margin Analytics, Price Optimization and Execution, Event Management, Supply Chain Software
